code:
def popitem(self, last=True):
            '''od.popitem() -> (k, v), return and remove a (key, value) pair.
            Pairs are returned in LIFO order if last is true or FIFO order if false.

            '''
            if not self:
                raise KeyError('dictionary is empty')
            root = self.__root
            if last:
                link = root[0]
                link_prev = link[0]
                link_prev[1] = root
                root[0] = link_prev
            else:
                link = root[1]
                link_next = link[1]
                root[1] = link_next
                link_next[0] = root
            key = link[2]
            del self.__map[key]
            value = dict.pop(self, key)
            return key, value

smell.description: The element is deleted from a container by a dynamically determined index.
